text.sentence: hey man what the fuck is going on with the broncos? the defense is terrible, the offense is mediocre at best, and our onle real hope on special teams is out with a screwed up ankle.
the raiders beat us at our own game, gruden has had a lot of time to study shanny's offensive system.
rhodes' defense looks exactly like robinson's, lets blitz everyone on every play, which works well if you get to the qb, but fails otherwise.
i thought it might be that they just haven't had time to jell, but i'm really starting to wonder about that.
and where the fuck is peder.
he's disappeared.
hopefully t.d. is back for good, he was the only good thing to come out of monday night.
return us to the promised land, or bring back THE MAN, everyone's coming out of retirement these days.
so what else is going on?
not much is going on here.
enron is on full melt down.
i think the company is about to go under due to fraud with our upper management.
it is one of the largest collapses in american business.
broncos suck.
i couldn't take watching that game on mon. the defense is miserable.
how can they be worse than they were last year?
i sent peder an email today b/c jen and max cannot get in touch with him.
how is school?
i am going to have to go back b/c i will be out of a job soon.
are you ready for miami?
peder's e-mail address no longer works.
it's disconnected.
i think it might be osama bin peder. he disappeared right after this thing happened, and he and i were talking about this sort thing in vegas right before it happened.
maybe we should find him, get him drunk with his pants around his ankles, and put him in on the broncos' defensive line. he defeinately couldn't do any worse.
big gas is blowing itself up huh? go figure.
take your energy business knowledge and get involved with the alternative energies (solar, hydrogen, wind).
it's time to move away from the dependance on oil.
we still need it, just not as much.
that's my liberal environmental eduacation talking.
happy friday!
did forseberg quit?
where have you been?
He's taking some time away from hockey.
Most suspect he'll either be back soon, so he can play in the Olympics for team Sweden, or he just might take the whole year off.
His body is beat up bad from the last several years.
Who knows . . . he might pull a Barry Sanders and walk away at the top of his game.
I told you Peder was missing.
i didn't hear about forseberg until i heard about kennison.
woody paige had a good article on the 14th about him quitting and all the shit he has been given.
peder is about to be replaced as and usher.
what's his new job . . .
table cloth ironer?
Kennison turned out to be a real disaster.
I'm beginning to think that many of our recent free agents are turning out to be other team's trash.
I guess the Tractor Traylor is not washed up, and he's a big reason why Chicago has turned it around.
Though he did get on Shanny's bad side during Pryce's holdout with some things he said.
We used to have this guy named Shannon Sharpe.
He's pretty good too.
If only i could say fuck it all and just go skiing, but it's been 70 degrees here for 5 weeks.
It's time Shanny hires me to help him out.
the broncos fucking suck.
they are ruining my fall.
i cannot believe this is happening to them.
I don't wanna talk about it.
Griese has lost his swagger, and his team.
HE needs to step up and take control, but he's no where even close.
